basics.name: Minkyeong Kim
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.A. in Information Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2026.

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Maui College

highlights: Provided individualized tutoring for student-athletes, focusing on mastering core math concepts and improving study strategies.
Collaborated with academic advisors to track student progress and ensure ongoing support tailored to each student's needs.
Assisted customers at the cashier and fitting room, providing friendly and efficient service to maintain a positive shopping experience.
Organized the backroom to ensure smooth inventory flow, maintaining an orderly and accessible workspace for team members.

work.company: University of Hawaii at Maui College
highlights: Assisted the instructor during lectures by monitoring student exercises and providing one-on-one support to ensure comprehension of class material.
Acted as an additional resource for students needing clarification on concepts, helping to reinforce learning through real-time assistance during the math lab hours.
Assisted children in learning to play musical instruments, including piano and flute, and in reading and understanding musical notation.
